entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
